issue.title: [C++][Doc] Document IPC API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I just noticed that we forgot to document the C++ Arrow IPC APIs, both in the "user guide" and "API reference" chapters.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10887?focusedCommentId=17250289) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8914
